recipesJson.name: Blulem Hazzard
recipesJson.author: Jacob55
recipesJson.description:
A rich blueberry lemonade, used Bilberry to buff out the Blackberry. Used a bit of Cactus to make it juicy... if the Lemonade is too strong just drop 1%. 

Let me know what you think!

reviews.text: I dropped the lemonade to 6 because that's where I like it.  The blueberry profile works nicely with the lemonade, and there's just enough cactus that you only know it's there if you're looking for it.
